testCases.title: User Listing and Display
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality of the System Users listing, including column display and pagination.
testCases.expectedResult: The System Users list should display all users with correct information in appropriate columns and provide pagination controls.

steps.stepDescription: Login to the system with administrator credentials.
steps.expectedResult: User should be successfully logged in with administrator privileges.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the System Users section.
steps.expectedResult: System Users listing page should load with user records displayed.

steps.stepDescription: Verify all expected columns are present in the user listing.
steps.expectedResult: Columns should include: Username, First Name, Last Name, Phone, Email, Extension, Role, Is Active, Created On, and Created By.

steps.stepDescription: Verify user records display correct information.
steps.expectedResult: Each user record should display appropriate data in all columns.

steps.stepDescription: Test the pagination controls if multiple pages of users exist.
steps.expectedResult: Pagination controls should navigate between pages of user records.

steps.stepDescription: Verify page information display (e.g., "1 - 14 of 14").
steps.expectedResult: Page information should accurately reflect current page and total records.

testCases.title: User Search Functionality
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to search and filter users based on various criteria.
testCases.expectedResult: The search function should filter users based on entered criteria and display matching results.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the System Users section.
steps.expectedResult: System Users listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Click on the Search button.
steps.expectedResult: Search User modal should open with search fields.

steps.stepDescription: Verify all search fields are present.
steps.expectedResult: Search fields should include: Username, First Name, Last Name, Phone, Email, Extension, Role, Is Active, Created On, and Created By.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by Username only.
steps.expectedResult: System should filter users to show only those matching the entered username.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by First Name and Last Name.
steps.expectedResult: System should filter users to show only those matching the entered names.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by Role (using dropdown).
steps.expectedResult: System should filter users to show only those with the selected role.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by Is Active status.
steps.expectedResult: System should filter users to show only active or inactive users based on selection.

steps.stepDescription: Test searching by Created On date.
steps.expectedResult: System should filter users to show only those created on the selected date.

steps.stepDescription: Test combining multiple search criteria.
steps.expectedResult: System should filter users to show only those matching all entered criteria.

steps.stepDescription: Test the Apply button to execute the search.
steps.expectedResult: Search should execute and filtered results should display in the user list.

steps.stepDescription: Test the Cancel button to dismiss the search.
steps.expectedResult: Search modal should close without applying filters.

testCases.title: New User Creation
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to create new user accounts in the system.
testCases.expectedResult: New users should be successfully created with all specified information and appropriate system-generated values.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the System Users section.
steps.expectedResult: System Users listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Click on the New button.
steps.expectedResult: New User modal should open with empty user form.

steps.stepDescription: Verify all required fields are present in the form.
steps.expectedResult: Form should include: Username, First Name, Last Name, Phone, Email, Extension (auto-generated), Role, and Is Active fields.

steps.stepDescription: Test creating a user without filling required fields.
steps.expectedResult: System should prevent submission and highlight required fields.

steps.stepDescription: Fill in all required fields with valid data.
steps.expectedResult: All fields should accept input without errors.

steps.stepDescription: Verify Extension is auto-generated and displayed.
steps.expectedResult: Extension field should show "Autogenerated:" and a number.

steps.stepDescription: Select a Role from the dropdown.
steps.expectedResult: Role should be selectable from available options (Administrator, Supervisor, Counsellor, Case Manager).

steps.stepDescription: Set Is Active status.
steps.expectedResult: Is Active status should be selectable (Yes/No).

steps.stepDescription: Click Create button.
steps.expectedResult: New user should be created successfully and appear in the user list.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the new user appears with correct information.
steps.expectedResult: New user should be displayed with all entered information and system-generated values.

steps.stepDescription: Test the Cancel button during user creation.
steps.expectedResult: Form should close without creating a user.

testCases.title: User Details View
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to view detailed information for an existing user.
testCases.expectedResult: User details should be displayed accurately with all relevant information.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the System Users section.
steps.expectedResult: System Users listing page should load with user records.

steps.stepDescription: Click on a user record in the list.
steps.expectedResult: User Details modal should open showing detailed information for the selected user.

steps.stepDescription: Verify all user information fields are displayed.
steps.expectedResult: Details should include: Username, Full Names, Phone, Email, Extension, Role, Is Active, Created On, and Created By.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the information displayed matches the user record.
steps.expectedResult: All displayed information should match what appears in the user list for the selected user.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the Edit button is present.
steps.expectedResult: Edit button should be visible for users with appropriate permissions.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the dropdown menu next to Edit button.
steps.expectedResult: Dropdown should be present with additional options.

steps.stepDescription: Close the User Details modal.
steps.expectedResult: Modal should close and return to the user list view.

testCases.title: User Editing
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to edit existing user information.
testCases.expectedResult: User information should be successfully updated with changes preserved in the system.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the System Users section.
steps.expectedResult: System Users listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Click on a user record to view details.
steps.expectedResult: User Details modal should open.

steps.stepDescription: Click on the Edit button.
steps.expectedResult: User details should become editable.

steps.stepDescription: Modify the First Name field.
steps.expectedResult: First Name should be editable and accept changes.

steps.stepDescription: Modify the Last Name field.
steps.expectedResult: Last Name should be editable and accept changes.

steps.stepDescription: Modify the Phone number.
steps.expectedResult: Phone number should be editable and accept changes.

steps.stepDescription: Modify the Email address.
steps.expectedResult: Email should be editable and accept changes.

steps.stepDescription: Change the Role selection if applicable.
steps.expectedResult: Role should be changeable via dropdown.

steps.stepDescription: Change the Is Active status if applicable.
steps.expectedResult: Is Active status should be changeable.

steps.stepDescription: Save the changes.
steps.expectedResult: Changes should be saved successfully and reflected in the user list.

steps.stepDescription: Verify changes persist by reopening the user details.
steps.expectedResult: Updated information should be displayed when viewing user details again.

testCases.title: Password Reset Functionality
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to reset a user's password.
testCases.expectedResult: User passwords should be reset successfully with appropriate security measures.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the System Users section.
steps.expectedResult: System Users listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Click on a user record to view details.
steps.expectedResult: User Details modal should open.

steps.stepDescription: Click on the dropdown menu next to the Edit button.
steps.expectedResult: Dropdown menu should expand with options.

steps.stepDescription: Select the Reset Password option.
steps.expectedResult: Password reset confirmation dialog should appear.

steps.stepDescription: Confirm the password reset action.
steps.expectedResult: System should process the reset and display confirmation message.

steps.stepDescription: Verify system behavior after password reset (e.g., email notification, temporary password).
steps.expectedResult: System should handle post-reset actions according to design (notification, temporary password generation, etc.).

steps.stepDescription: Test login with the reset credentials if applicable.
steps.expectedResult: Login should work with reset credentials and possibly prompt for password change.

testCases.title: User Deactivation and Reactivation
testCases.description: This test case verifies the functionality to deactivate and reactivate user accounts.
testCases.expectedResult: Users should be successfully deactivated and reactivated with appropriate system behavior for each state.

steps.stepDescription: Navigate to the System Users section.
steps.expectedResult: System Users listing page should load.

steps.stepDescription: Click on an active user record to view details.
steps.expectedResult: User Details modal should open showing an active user.

steps.stepDescription: Click the Edit button.
steps.expectedResult: User details should become editable.

steps.stepDescription: Change Is Active status from Yes to No.
steps.expectedResult: Is Active dropdown should allow selection of No.

steps.stepDescription: Save the changes.
steps.expectedResult: Changes should save successfully and user status should update to inactive.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the user's active status in the user list.
steps.expectedResult: User should show as inactive in the user listing.

steps.stepDescription: Test login with the deactivated user's credentials (if applicable).
steps.expectedResult: System should prevent login for deactivated users.

steps.stepDescription: Reactivate the user by editing and changing Is Active back to Yes.
steps.expectedResult: User should be reactivated successfully.

steps.stepDescription: Verify the user's active status after reactivation.
steps.expectedResult: User should show as active in the user listing.

steps.stepDescription: Test login with the reactivated user's credentials (if applicable).
steps.expectedResult: System should allow login for reactivated users.
